  • Writing a Custom Shellcoder Encrypter - First Post by Zero++;

    18 Sep 2022

    In this blogpost we will write an custom Shellcode Cryptor in go. But what exactly is Shellcode? Shellcode is a combination of binary instruction that will be executed on cpu. Shellcode can be used for everything, to spawn a reverse shell, to execute a program, to obtain a file descriptor...
